headline: Dow Announces the Pricing of its Cash Tender Offer
summary: The Dow Chemical Company ("TDCC"), a wholly owned subsidiary of Dow Inc. (NYSE: DOW), announced today, in connection with its previously announced tender offer (the "Tender Offer") to purchase certain of its debt securities and certain debt securities of Rohm and Haas Company ("Rohm and Haas") and Union Carbide Corporation ("UCC"), each a wholly owned subsidiary of TDCC, the pricing terms for the series of notes and debentures listed in the table below (collectively, the "Securities") that have

headline: Dow to participate in J.P. Morgan 2025 Industrials Conference
summary: Dow Inc. (NYSE: DOW) will participate in a fireside chat during the J.P. Morgan Industrials Conference on Thursday, March 13 at 8:15 a.m. ET.

headline: DOW Invests in Xycle to Enhance Circular Feedstock Access
summary: DOW will offtake the circular feedstock produced to create new circular plastics, which are in high demand from global customers and brands.
